document.full_text: lebron james produced some more fourth-quarter magic to propel the miami heat to a scrappy 85-75 win over the chicago bulls on wednesday, evening their nba eastern conference final at a game each.
document.title: "street fighter" lebron james pushes heat past bulls
lines_and_colors: lebron james produced some more fourth-quarter magic to propel the miami heat to a scrappy 85-75 win over the chicago bulls on wednesday, evening their nba eastern conference final at a game each.
